title: I Double Dog Dare You (Epic Challenge)
body: To AFK for 5 minutes in 3 different LoL games. I double dog stick-your-tongue-to-a-frozen-lamppost dare you. Come back to this thread and post your experience if you're man enough to try this challenge.

replies.body: challenging....some ppl like a good challenge but not me
No, because I'm not an idiot.
I disapprove of encouraging people to afk.
